reviewText: I saw this movie a number of times on Cinemax a few years ago. Really enjoyed it!!! Very sexy, with a good story and talented actors. Unavailable?? Please bring this movie back so I can buy it! (Unedited version best)

I thought this was an adult movie that might have some interesting twists.  In fact, it is a Cinemax movie that I have cut off after briefly viewing on late nite TV.  It is only worth purchasing if you cannot afford premium cable channels and you are very lonely.  R-rated sex, the same women you find in dozens of Cinemax movies doing the same guys.  An absolute waste.  Straight to garbage can.

Kira Reeds best film by far.

Normally these are the kinds of film one has to suffer through on cable for some decent nudity. This film is not only watchable, it's actually good. Amy Lindsay is also exceptionally hot in a mild S&M fetish scene. But nothing compares to Kira Reed running around in her French maid outfit.

Production values are incredibly high for this sort of film, even has a decent soundtrack. And a storyline that is probably as good as it gets for this genre.
